hooks.command: python3 -c "import json, sys; data=json.load(sys.stdin); path=data.get('tool_input',{}).get('file_path','') or data.get('tool_input',{}).get('path',''); sys.exit(2) if ('/tmp/' in path or path.startswith('~/tmp')) else 0"

statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir' | sed 's|.*/||'); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); version=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.version'); cd "$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir')"; if git rev-parse --git-dir > /dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo 'detached'); status=$(git status --porcelain 2>/dev/null | wc -l | tr -d ' '); if [ "$status" != "0" ]; then git_status="*"; else git_status=""; fi; git_info="$branch$git_status"; else git_info="no-git"; fi; printf "ğŸ“%s â•‘ ğŸ¤–%s â•‘ ğŸ·ï¸%s â•‘ ğŸŒ¿%s" "$cwd" "$model" "$version" "$git_info"
